name: Clash of Chefs VR
description: Clash of Chefs VR is a delicious cook-off game. Prepare the tastiest meals the fastest you can. Enjoy unique VR game with no motion sickness. Test your skills in the kitchens of the world each featuring new recipes and 20 challenging single player levels. Clash with other chefs in online multiplayer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Additional Notes: VR Only
